policies.name: Any Realm Role Policy
policies.description: Defines that only users who have at least one Realm Role can do something.

policies.name: Only Admin Realm Role Policy
policies.description: Defines that only Admin users can do something

policies.name: Only Admin-Organization Realm Role Policy
policies.description: Defines that only Admin-Organization users can do something

policies.name: Only Master Organization Policy
policies.description: Defines that only who are registered on master organization can do something.

policies.name: Only Organization Owner by Attribute Policy
policies.description: Defines that only the owner of an organization can do something.

policies.name: Only Admin Realm Role on Master Organization Policy
policies.description: Defines that only the owner of an organization can do something.

config.applyPolicies: ["Only Admin Realm Role Policy","Only Master Organization Policy"]

policies.name: View Organization Permission
policies.description: A policy that allows to get organization information to any valid roles.

policies.name: Create Organization Permission
policies.description: A policy that only allows the admin on master organization to create organizations.

config.applyPolicies: ["Only Admin Realm Role on Master Organization Policy"]

policies.name: Update Organization Permission
policies.description: A policy that only allows the admin on organization to update organization.

config.applyPolicies: ["Only Organization Owner by Attribute Policy","Only Admin Realm Role on Master Organization Policy"]

policies.name: Delete Organization Permission
policies.description: A policy that only allows the admin on master organization to delete organizations.

config.applyPolicies: ["Only Admin Realm Role on Master Organization Policy"]
